about_app.title: About This App
about_app.description: ©2023 rlaxx TV GmbH, Wall 55, 24103 Kiel, Germany. Court of Registry: Amtsgericht Kiel. Registration Number: HRB 21455 KI. VAT ID: DE329313048. Chief Executive Officer: Ronny Lutzi. Contact us at support@rlaxxtv.com

help_and_support.subtitle: Reach out to our customer support
help_and_support.title: Help & Support
help_and_support.explanation: If you’re experiencing problems with rlaxx TV or have any other questions or concerns, reach out to our customer support by pressing on the button below.
help_and_support.explanation_alt: If you’re experiencing problems with rlaxx TV or have any other questions or concerns, reach out to our customer support at rlaxxtv.com/support.
help_and_support.explanation_3: For better support, please provide us your current App Version: {{app_version}}
help_and_support.explanation_2: Or reach out to us by scanning the following QR code:

item_4.content: rlaxx TV is available as an app on iPhone/iPad, most smart TVs and in your browser. In addition, rlaxx TV will soon be available on Android phones and tablets. Visit rlaxxtv.com to find out where, when and how to download the rlaxx TV app for your preferred device and start streaming for free and without registration!
item_4.title: Where can I find rlaxx TV?

item_3.content:
As rlaxx TV is financed through advertisements, our offer remains completely free for viewers. You don't even have to create an account. You only need to download the app on your smart TV and then you can start watching!

Unlike linear TV, we don't show long commercial breaks but advertisement clips that initiate a short break. We show far less ads than the classic private TV channels.
item_3.title: What does rlaxx TV cost?

item_2.content: Our content is divided into channels with different genres, so that you can just simply zap to the channel that sparks your interest. We offer carefully curated channels as well as offers from content partners within our global network.
item_2.title: Which content can I expect to see on rlaxx TV?

item_1.content: rlaxx TV is an ad-financed and therefore a free streaming service, where content is shown in linear theme-based channels of diverse content providers. Functions such as pause, restart, or watch later as well as the possibility to access an on-demand library are of course included. This means that the app combines the relaxed experience of linear television with the flexibility of video on demand. It's like television — but different!
item_1.title: What is rlaxx TV?

consent_preferences.subtitle: Manage your consent for analytics & tracking
consent_preferences.title: Consent Preferences
consent_preferences.explanation: Anonymised data on viewing habits of our users helps us deliver a better rlaxx TV experience. To collect it, we need your consent - and you can manage the consents you give us or our partners any time.

code_501.title: Sorry, we ran into some troubles playing this video.

geoblocking.description: Please visit rlaxxtv.com for the latest news and updates regarding availability.

error.contact_support_hint: Contact us at rlaxxtv.com/support for further help

code_512-AFTV.description: The following devices are affected: Fire TV Gen 1 (AFTB), Fire TV Gen 2 (AFTS), Fire TV Stick Gen 1 (AFTM) and Fire TV Stick Gen 2 (AFTT).
code_512-AFTV.title: Sorry, your Fire TV device does not support rlaxx TV anymore.

code_513.description: While it's still working for now, some features and functionality might not be fully supported. We recommend updating to the latest version of the app. Trust us, it’s worth it!
code_513.title: Uh oh, looks like you're using an older version of our app.

code_512-GEN.description: Please try updating the app to the latest version. If you are unable to update the app, it is possible that your device may no longer be supported. If you continue with this version, you could run into issues with the app.
code_512-GEN.title: Sorry, this app version is no longer supported.

explanation.ios: Open the App Store app on your device -> Search for rlaxx TV and open the rlaxx TV App Store page from the search results -> Tap on the "Update" button
explanation.roku: Locate the rlaxx TV channel on your Home screen -> Ensure that rlaxx TV is highlighted with a white border, or use your remote to highlight it -> Press the star button on your remote and then select the "Check for updates" option
explanation.tvos: Open the App Store app on your device -> Search for rlaxx TV and open the rlaxx TV App Store page from the search results -> Press the "Update" button
explanation.android_tv: Open the Android TV search -> Search for rlaxx TV and open the rlaxx TV App Store page from the search results -> Press the "Update" button
explanation.fire_tv: Open the Fire TV search -> Search for rlaxx TV and open the rlaxx TV App Store page from the search results -> Press the "Update" button
explanation.generic: If you're having trouble updating your app on your device, try searching online for instructions for your device or contacting the manufacturer's support team.

code_512-DESP.title: Sorry, your {{device_name}} device does not support rlaxx TV anymore.

welcome.title: Welcome to rlaxx TV
welcome.description: We crafted an amazing entertainment service with hand-picked channels to let you follow your passions easily.

targeted-ads.title: We value your privacy
targeted-ads.description-secondary: Collection of data necessary for this service to function on a technical level is excluded from this setting.
targeted-ads.description: In order to further improve this service and to adapt it to the constantly changing needs of users, we analyze anonymous user behavior. In addition, rlaxx TV uses targeted advertising to better tailor advertising to the users and to display less irrelevant and repetitive advertising. This data is also anonymized and securely encrypted.

finish.title: All done!
finish.description: Enjoy without the need to search. Instantly jump into our TV program with the option to pause, forward, rewind, restart or watch later. And if you like, discover more content available in the on-demand section.
finish.description_us_age_confirmation: Enjoy without the need to search. Instantly jump into our TV program with the option to pause, forward, rewind, restart or watch later. And if you like, discover more content available in the on-demand section. By continuing you confirm that you are at least 13 years old.
finish.description-no-on-demand: Enjoy a seamless viewing experience without the need to search. Dive straight into our vast TV channels catalogue or browse through present and upcoming live content in the Program Guide.

apple-app-tracking.description:
We would like to enhance your rlaxx TV experience with more relevant advertising. For this we need your consent in the next step. The amount of advertisements played will not be affected by this setting.

Not interested in this? Do not worry, you can also simply object to this in the next step.
apple-app-tracking.title: Targeted Advertisement

loading-hint-2.description: Get ready to jump into our TV program with the option to pause, forward, rewind, restart or watch later. And if you like, discover more content available in the on-demand section.
loading-hint-2.title: Nearly there…

loading-hint-1.description: In just a moment you’ll be able to enjoy a diverse catalogue of channels across a wide range of categories such as sports, music, movies, lifestyle, and adventure.
loading-hint-1.title: Getting things ready…

close-app.title: Do you want to close this app?

reset-app.title: Do you really want to reset the app?
reset-app.description: All your personal settings and locally stored data will be deleted.

description.rotate_to_portrait: Please rotate your device to the portrait orientation to exit fullscreen mode.
description.rotate_to_landscape: Please rotate your device to the landscape orientation to switch to fullscreen mode.

age_rating.description: Sorry, due to local child protection regulations, you can only watch this content after 23:00 o’clock.

anchors.privacy_changes: Changes to this data privacy statement

settings.title: Privacy settings
settings.text: In order to further improve this service and to adapt it to the constantly changing needs of users, we analyze anonymous user behavior. In addition, rlaxx TV uses targeted advertising to better tailor advertising to the users and to display less irrelevant and repetitive advertising. This data is also anonymized and securely encrypted.
settings.hint: Collection of data necessary for this service to function on a technical level is excluded from this setting.
settings.opted-out: As requested by you, rlaxx TV will not share any tracking data with other apps and websites. However, rlaxx TV will still have to use some cookies to ensure that its service can operate properly. The data used for this will of course be anonymised and therefore cannot be traced back to you.

hint.press_ok_to_switch: Press the “OK” button on your remote to switch channels

app-tracking-transparency-prompt.purpose: This data is used to deliver more relevant advertising to you. Additionally, we use this data to analyse user behaviour patterns as well as video playback performance to help us continuously improve rlaxx TV.

channel_promotion.summary_text: Since your last visit we’ve added {{missed}} new channels to rlaxx TV – why don’t you give them a try? There could be something for you too!

portfolio_notice.description: rlaxx TV is not officially available in your region yet. You will therefore only see a limited selection of channels and content.
portfolio_notice.title: Please Note

beta_gate.wrong_code: Sorry, wrong code, please try again.
beta_gate.website_hint: Visit us on rlaxxtv.com for more information
beta_gate.description: The rlaxx TV beta for the web browser is not available in your region yet. Please enter your access code below to take a look at a preview of what's to come. This preview only includes a limited selection of channels and content and does not reflect the final product.
beta_gate.title: rlaxx TV Web Beta

description.empty: There is no additional information for this content
